title: Data race in les.Stop()
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.7.2
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : 6d6a5a93370371a33fb815d7ae47b60c7021c86a

#### Expected behaviour
No data races in the code.

#### Actual behaviour
Data race caused unsave operation with wait group: any wg.Add() should be after wg.Wait().

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I've found this data race while running test of Status-IM project: `github.com/status-im/status-go/e2e/node_test.(*ManagerTestSuite).TestNodeStartCrash()`

#### Backtrace

````
==================
WARNING: DATA RACE
Write at 0x00c4200fa46c by goroutine 106:
  internal/race.Write()
      /usr/local/go/src/internal/race/race.go:41 +0x38
  sync.(*WaitGroup).Wait()
      /usr/local/go/src/sync/waitgroup.go:129 +0xf4
  github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/les.(*ProtocolManager).Stop()
      /home/eugene/go/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/build/_workspace/project/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/les/handler.go:246 +0x114
  github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/les.(*LightEthereum).Stop()
      /home/eugene/go/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/build/_workspace/project/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/les/backend.go:222 +0xb3
  github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/node.(*Node).Stop()
      /home/eugene/go/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/build/_workspace/project/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/node/node.go:488 +0x337
...

Previous read at 0x00c4200fa46c by goroutine 35:
  internal/race.Read()
      /usr/local/go/src/internal/race/race.go:37 +0x38
  sync.(*WaitGroup).Add()
      /usr/local/go/src/sync/waitgroup.go:71 +0x16f
  github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/les.(*lightFetcher).syncLoop()
      /home/eugene/go/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/build/_workspace/project/src/github.com/status-im/status-go/vendor/github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/les/fetcher.go:126 +0x95
````
